<h2>Add Anime</h2>
<p>Use Mal Id to add anime through website or terminal</p>
<https://myanimelist.net>
     
<h2>Example</h2>

```shell
foo@bar: getAnime -a 21
---Adding---
1 ID: 21 One Piece
```
